amendment.description: To prohibit funds from being used to provide housing assistance benefits to individuals convicted of certain criminal offenses.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3905 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3905 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Heller to Amendment SA 3896.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3905 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
